name: Talonflame
description: The Scorching Pokémon. In the fever of an exciting battle, it showers embers from the gaps between its feathers and takes to the air.

abilities.name: Flame Body
abilities.description: The flames from this Pokémon's body shine dim light in a 15 ft radius. In addition, when hit by a melee attack, roll a d10. On a 10, the attacker is burned.

abilities.name: Gale Wings
abilities.description: This Pokémon adds an additional +1 to hit when using flying-type attacks.
